reviews.title: Visiting the branch
reviews.text: When I visited the branch I had little idea what I wanted to do with my expired bond. I was greeted in a friendly way and chose to be served by Alexis. She was extremely helpful and I decided to open a new ISA. Thank you. In

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.text: I find them easy to deal with friendly and efficient service

reviews.title: Family Building Society Mortgage Information
reviews.text: Louise was very helpful, and explained in detail all the options that are open to us. We look forward to speaking to Louise’s colleague on Friday between 10am-12noon.

reviews.title: My initial telephone call for a mortgage
reviews.text: My initial telephone call with your employee Alice Bennett was excellent - very knowledgeable, polite and helpful in every way to take my mortgage enquiry further. As an employer, I would be very pleased if all my staff dealt with our enquiries in the same manner

reviews.title: Serena was exceptional in helping me to renew my mor...
reviews.text: Serena was exceptional in helping me to renew my mortgage. She went over and above from whatever anyone could expect. Including remembering me from a week before, and taking the trouble to walk to a different department to find out the answer to a question.

reviews.title: Had a message chat and was given a number to talk ab...
reviews.text: Had a message chat and was given a number to talk about my new mortgage rates options, it was the savings number, but I was politely and quickly transferred to new business. Small queue, answer pretty quickly, person very polite, helpful, knowledgeable and gave me the advice I neeeded to make a product decision. Provided additional info and signposted the next steps.

reviews.title: New business team was very helpful.
reviews.text: New business team was very helpful.

reviews.title: Received the usual comprehensive, professional and f...
reviews.text: Received the usual comprehensive, professional and friendly assistance when discussing my mortgage arrangements. Always provide the information I require in order for me to make an informed decision.

reviews.title: First Class Help
reviews.text: The few times I have made contact the help has been excellent

reviews.title: Well Done Family Building Society
reviews.text: Louise Taylor was really helpful discussing through a possible mortgage solution for my son his wife. She was thorough and really understanding. We have past experience of an mortgage with Family Building Society and also have savings with them. They have been top rate on both sides. I would recommend them a lot.

reviews.title: House Purchase
reviews.text: I received a thorough and clear explanation of every aspect of the matter at hand and I detected an air of efficiency and professionalism.

reviews.title: extremely helpful and very pleasant,...
reviews.text: The advisor was extremely helpful and very pleasant, I would definitely recommend Family Building Society

reviews.title: FBS customer services agent was very helpful
reviews.text: FBS customer services agent was very helpful when I enquired about renewing my current interest only mortgage loan which is due to expire in April. He provided me with full details about my options and assisted me in making the best selection for my new mortgage loan product.

reviews.title: FRAUD NEVER APOLOGISED
reviews.text: FBS sent me a bill some 12 months after I took the loan which was unjustified and I had to fight long and hard to get this removed. Bailiff was mentioned. VERY BAD

reviews.title: I needed help in re-establishing my sign-on details...
reviews.text: I needed help in re-establishing my sign-on details with National Counties following a catastrophic loss of data on my laptop. This could only be done at speed, by phoning. Fortunately, with the help of Tracey Rogers I was able to recreate my full sign-on USER NAME and passwords. Despite my slow speed at getting through the necessary stages, with Tracy's very patient help and guidance I got the task completed. Thank you so much for this, Tracy.

reviews.title: Very easy to get to speak to Luke Green who was extr...
reviews.text: Very easy to get to speak to Luke Green who was extremely helpful and informative

reviews.title: HI Lisa, thanks for your support. You were amazing 5*
reviews.text: HI Lisa, thanks for your support. I was really struggling with it but you helped me.

reviews.title: Very helpful friendly advisor very knowledgable
reviews.text: Very helpful friendly advisor very knowledgable

reviews.title: Experience of Remortgaging a BTL Mortgage
reviews.text: I generally had a seamless experience with their remortgaging team and process. Their BTL products for expats are reasonably competitive including fees. I would have liked the option, particularly in the current environment of falling interest rates of a lifetime tracker BTL mortgage product. I am generally very happy with the Family Building Society, particularly when other lending providers would not consider expats for BTL mortgages.

reviews.title: It was a pleasure to talk to Lisa today and she was...
reviews.text: It was a pleasure to talk to Lisa today and she was very helpful

reviews.title: The team at the fbs are always so helpful, polite an...
reviews.text: The team at the fbs are always so helpful, polite and knowledgeable.

reviews.title: excellent customer service when i called your office...
reviews.text: excellent customer service when i called your office to discuss new mortgage products... thank you, you made to whole process easy.

reviews.title: I needed help getting online.
reviews.text: I needed help getting online. I used the online help number. It was answered quickly. The colleague put me at ease and stayed with me until I was happy that I was successfully active online with my mortgage account.

reviews.title: Good response to queries .
reviews.text: Good response to queries .Efficient and professional ser ice .

reviews.title: Call back service was fast and very helpful
reviews.text: I arranged a call back to confirm recent transactions. Fast call back and niceclady was very helpful and efficient

reviews.title: Brilliant professional service.
reviews.text: Brilliant professional service. I receive my mortgage statement yearly showing all transactions and data clearly and easy to understand. I would recommend Family Building Society to everyone.

reviews.title: £1600 being taken from ex-mortgagees account
reviews.text: We had a worrying problem about £1600 being taken by the Family Building Soc from our current account from a discontinued mortgage. Spoketo your first point of contact Donnika Nelson. She was courteous, reassuring then promptly and efficiently dealt with the problem. Well done Donika. from Frank& Jenny Palmer

reviews.title: Enquired about a few technical & practical aspects o...
reviews.text: Enquired about a few technical & practical aspects of my mortgage. Lisa was very competent & empathetic.

reviews.title: A Very Satisfied Customer!
reviews.text: Having applied,with the services of a broker,for a mortgage at the age of 69years,I was worried regarding,in my eyes,how my application might fail but was reassured,by my broker,all was okay.And,as it turned out,it was.That was 2013.I have never regretted,for any reason,joining National Counties Building Society as was and now,Family Building Society.Thank you.

reviews.title: I found your staff to be very friendly & helpful
reviews.text: I found both Katherine and Louise very friendly, professional and extremely helpful. I had asked the question about porting my mortgage and Katherine passed me over to Louise who answered my queries plus more.

reviews.title: Amazing support from Family Building Society
reviews.text: Amazing support from Grace the Bdm and the whole mortgage helpdesk as well as the underwriting team, including Somy. A fantastic change to the norm and such a breath of Fresh Air to work with Family Building Society. Covered all of the points of acquired and communication was spot on with everything. Other lenders should take a leaf out of your book.!!!

reviews.title: A PLEASURE TO DO BUSINESS WITH!
reviews.text: I took out a BTL mortgage with Family which was secured via a broker (I am an expat and couldn't go direct). Since it has been in place I have had several questions regarding possible future options and have been able to contact Family direct instead of going through the broker. I am so impressed with them. Each time I've called I've been put straight through to an appropriate team member, who has listened and given me excellent advice (not financial, of course) as to which products do what and so on, and today they couldn't help me directly as they don't offer what I am looking for, but they made enquiries and put me in touch with someone who can definitely help. They didn't have to do that - they just wanted to help a client. I can't recommend them highly enough - they're kindly and understanding, courteous and extremely informed and helpful. Bravo Family Building Society

reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
reviews.text: Louise Taylor from FBS was extremely helpful

reviews.title: Helpful Honest Answers
reviews.text: Help with my question and helped me make the most of my mortgage

reviews.title: 50 years between and still as helpful as ever.
reviews.text: They have always been helpful in identifying the needs -v- the opportunities. Oddly they are my "buffers". They gave me my first mortgage in 1975 and now my last in 2025!

reviews.title: As per usual, the customer services were second to n...
reviews.text: As per usual, the customer services were second to none. Such a breath of fresh air. Having had mortgages for the best part of 40 years, this company is by far the easiest company to deal with. Thank you!!

reviews.title: I spoke to Guy.
reviews.text: I spoke to Guy. Very professional and explained things very clearly. Took his time as I didn’t fully understand and explained the options available. Was very nervous to discuss daunting remortgaging but Guy made the experience great. Great customer service Guy! Thanks.

reviews.title: good advice over the phone and suggestions as to the...
reviews.text: good advice over the phone and suggestions as to the products

reviews.title: Well informed mortgage advisers- explaining everythi...
reviews.text: Well informed mortgage advisers- explaining everything to my satisfaction & guiding me through the process- excellent service

reviews.title: I have not dealt with The Family BS until recently a...
reviews.text: I have not dealt with The Family BS until recently and I had a case which was proving a bit unusual in that it was a Joint application sole proprietor. I initially spoke to Nathan Waller as the usual BDM was on leave, Nathan was excellent. When Sam Morrison came back off leave I went through the case again with him. Before we submitted the case there was lots of questions I had to round things off, I have to say that Sam was absolutely excellent. Nothing was too much trouble for him, he called me back on time, he answered all of my questions, no issues at all, I can't praise him enough and what a nice guy to deal with. I must say that FBS have got it so right, even on the odd occasion I had to ring the main office everyone was great. Well Done FBS. I'm looking forward to seeing now that the underwriters are going to make the final process as good.

reviews.title: Lisa was very Helpful and answered all I need.
reviews.text: Lisa was very Helpful and answered all I need.

reviews.title: Moving to a new product after a fixed term deal.
reviews.text: Coming to the end of a fix with the Family, I asked about moving to a new product and had a great experience speaking with Guy Williams on the new business team. Really useful and very insightful, he explained in detail several options and allowed me to consider a few different ways of moving on. I couldn't thank him enough !

reviews.title: Asked about redemption of mortgage and advisor could...
reviews.text: Asked about redemption of mortgage and advisor could not be more helpful

reviews.title: Real people, really helpful
reviews.text: Quickly and easily accessible, friendly and jargon-free people to talk to, able to answer all our questions and guide us through the minefields. Even the waiting music is good, and I was sorry we got put through too quickly (10 seconds) for me to enjoy it more. So impressed that my daughter is opening an ISA with you so that we are keeping everything in the family...building...society.

reviews.title: The Friendly BS - they live up to their name.
reviews.text: The Friendly BS have been helpful and understanding throughout the period of our mortgage. I was retired when we took out our interest only mortgage and I am 75 as I write this review as we are about to pay it off. If you are retired but still require a mortgage consider using the Friendly. They live up to their name.

reviews.title: Very good service by guy.
reviews.text: Very good service by guy. Clear and excellent information given good old-fashioned service. I’m now making an application as I was so impressed there was no waffle and information was crystal clear.

reviews.title: Excellent professional service from Nathan.
reviews.text: Nathan was absolutely brilliant in taking my call and helping me to get the best results possible for my client. He is a credit to your company.

reviews.title: Excellent service.
reviews.text: Excellent service. Easy to deal with. Louise was very efficient

reviews.title: I needed an Ex Pat Mortgage renewal.
reviews.text: I needed an Ex Pat Mortgage renewal. Spoke with Erick he was exceptional, talked me through the product and the process with precision. Alice was also great she was prompt to reply just as Erick was. They made the process so simple and from 3500 miles away that is exactly what I required.

reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT, GREAT PEOPLE!
reviews.text: I've recently contacted Family Building Society about possibilities for the long-term future (eg extending my mortgage term) and also help with temporary difficulties, and they couldn't have been more helpful. I've been made to feel very welcome each time I have called, and all three people I've spoken with recently - Arounima, Aisha and Erick - have displayed incredible empathy and patience while I waffled on and have given me as much help as I could possibly have wished for. When I was looking to take out a mortgage 2 years ago, Family offered easily the best product for an ex-pat. I recommend Family wholeheartedly.

reviews.text: My call was answered by Kasey who was very helpful and guided me through the process to get a new verification code in order to be able to log in.

reviews.title: Great, friendly, professional service always
reviews.text: I spoke to Arounima R at great length asking in depth questions, FBS are lucky to have her, she was calm, professional and detailed. I miss the old school style service that FBS still have, highly recommend them.

A promised call-back following a criteria check happened within minutes, with a courtesy call the following day. And love the on-hold music - Santander, eat your heart out!

Thanks LISA

He answered all of my questions in an easy to understand way. Before finishing my call he made sure that i was happy and didn’t have any further questions.

reviews.title: Catherine was professional, friendly and helpful.
reviews.text: Catherine was professional, friendly and helpful. However, as I had only 1 customer in front of me in the queue, and it took some time to answer my call, was she the only person dealing with calls. Finally, please use a lower case 'r' for 'Kind regards'.

reviews.title: Applying for new fixed rate mortgage product.
reviews.text: Various telephone and email conversations re applying for a new fixed interest rate. Latest telephone conversation on 21 August with Alice Bennett. She was very friendly, professional and proactively helpful in resolving my enquiry.

He was a credit to himself and the Family Building Society. I would not hesitate to recommend the society to others based on my experience. Tony

reviews.text: I have had all my questions answered clearly and with much expertise.

reviews.title: Spoke to amie very helpful patient and knowledg...
reviews.text: Spoke to amie very helpful patient and knowledgeable thank you. She helped with all my questions.

reviews.title: Quick to answer the telephone.
reviews.text: Quick to answer the telephone. All questions answered promptly.

reviews.title: Spoke to Louise she was very knowledgable and very h...
reviews.text: Spoke to Louise she was very knowledgable and very helpful excellent service

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: Your staff have an excellent customer care manner, they explain everything in clear and concise manner

reviews.title: Louise Taylor deserves a big fat bonus, and a pay rise.
reviews.text: I made an enquiry to see if I am eligible to be a customer, and I received a prompt response which asked for some details, followed quickly by a phone call to take it further. Louise Taylor was my contact and she was excellent. Very helpful, friendly, professional, a joy to be treated in such a pleasant way.

reviews.title: Got locked out of my account.
reviews.text: Got locked out of my account. New security can be intimidating. They rang me back and sorted it. I am deaf but Rita spoke clearly and communicated well.

reviews.title: Choosing a new new mortgage product
reviews.text: Telephone conversation with Kieran Smith to discuss and arrange new fixed interest rate upon imminent expiry of current discounted rate. Very helpful and arranged quickly. This follows discussions with David Hobbs and Luke Green last week, both also very helpful. Thank you.

reviews.title: Lisa Adams was a very courteous and helpful adviser...
reviews.text: Lisa Adams was a very courteous and helpful adviser who talked me through my repayment options

reviews.title: professional knowledgeable and pleasant
reviews.text: professional knowledgeable and pleasant

reviews.title: First class customer service.
reviews.text: First class customer service. I had 2 questions and received prompt email responses to both. One enquiry required a telephone call to confirm certain details and, having been promptly connected to the person I had been communicating by email, everything was resolved within minutes. Very impressed.

reviews.title: The refreshingly family-oriented building society
reviews.text: I have always found the staff at the Family Building society super helpful and friendly and actually talk to you like its your own family business. Its extremely refreshing to have this level of customer service in today's automated everything.

reviews.title: Why was the call necessary?
reviews.text: I telephoned FBS as they had failed to pass me some information they agreed to deliver when I last contacted them some 6 weeks previously. I was dealt with efficiently and the information was promised within a few days.

reviews.title: Very Helpful
reviews.text: Very helpful, knowledgable and efficient. The representative (Julie) did exactly what she said she would do and timely.

reviews.title: Mix up over our monthly payments
reviews.text: A mix up over our monthly payments meant that 2 payments were taken out this month. Called Customer Services and they identified the issue and resolved it vweet quickly

reviews.title: Very friendly customer service, excellent telephone...
reviews.text: Very friendly customer service, excellent telephone manner

reviews.title: Spoke to an incredibly helpful lady who assisted me...
reviews.text: Spoke to an incredibly helpful lady who assisted me with altering my address, and gave reassurance about how and when I will remortgage. I felt anxious about calling as I only completed on Monday and have never had a mortgage. She was fab, and I didn’t feel nervous at all.

reviews.title: I have just spent around fifteen minutes on the phon...
reviews.text: I have just spent around fifteen minutes on the phone with Lisa. My enquiry was dealt with in such à efficient way. Lisa was so helpful and has a lovely personality. What a joy.

reviews.title: Telephone conversation with Louise Taylor was extrem...
reviews.text: Telephone conversation with Louise Taylor was extremely helpful.

reviews.title: I tried to get through on the 9th June.
reviews.text: I tried to get through on the 9th June. Automated service says I was number one in the queue. I hung on for 30 minutes each minute to be told I was first in the queue. It then offered me a call back service which I acceoted but did not get a call back. Today I phoned again and Louise Taylor answered the phome and thank goodness was extremely helpful and was able to help me.

reviews.title: fixed Rate coming to an end.
reviews.text: we have had a mortgage with FBS for sometime. We recently contacted them as our fixed rate product was about to end. The lady we spoke to was very helpful and was well informed when answering our questions and was able to offer excellent advice based on our requirements.

reviews.title: Very good customer service, and really quick to work...
reviews.text: Very good customer service, and really quick to work with. No problems whatsoever and definitely recommended.

reviews.title: Gillian Collard was very very helpful thank you.
reviews.text: Gillian Collard was very very helpful thank you. very patient

reviews.title: open clear and straightforward excellent communication
reviews.text: open clear and straightforward excellent communication

reviews.title: Good service and a good range of products to suit
reviews.text: Good service and a good range of products to suit

reviews.title: Great customer service as well as competitive rates
reviews.text: I have my mortgage with Family because they had the best rate and it hasn't been any trouble. In a position now to make an overpayment and so called up to understand the process and was very happy with the service. Spoke to Lisa and Jill on separate calls and they were both excellent. Polite, professional and proactively helpful really tremendous friendly service both times. Great to get such excellent human service will recommend Family after this experience.

reviews.title: Aimee was brilliant.
reviews.text: Aimee was very helpful over the phone, able to answer all my questions and anything she's didn't know she was able to find out. All done very polietly and quickly. Very impressed. Great customer service..

reviews.title: Great response once I got through!!
reviews.text: Great interaction with Luke on call. All queries answered in one call. Only downside was waiting 15 mins in call queue

reviews.title: Excellent customer service - super knowledgeable
reviews.text: Excellent custimer service with Gillian Collard being very courteous, quick and most of all very knowledgeable. Within about 10 seconds of passing security, she spotted the issue with my access and had two options to get me back up and running. Couldn't be happier.

reviews.title: Great Service
reviews.text: Very helpful staff. Didn't take long to get to the right person.

reviews.title: My mortgage product was coming to the end of its ter...
reviews.text: My mortgage product was coming to the end of its term and was being changed to a new product. I had a query that I needed to resolve first and contacted Kieran Smith who gave me the answers I needed. I have spoke to Kieran before and he is excellent, as are ALL the staff that I have dealt with. Great company, great staff. Thank you.

reviews.title: Thank you Michelle for an excellent service experi...
reviews.text: Thank you Michelle for an excellent service experience

reviews.title: FBS sees gaps in the market to offer mortgages to th...
reviews.text: FBS sees gaps in the market to offer mortgages to those families turned away by others. This is highly appreciated and forward thinking.

reviews.title: Erick Dodd
reviews.text: Erick was very helpful and gave full advice

reviews.title: First class service
reviews.text: Professional, knowledgeable, efficient. First class! Thank you.

reviews.title: Remortgaging how it should be - fast, clear and simple
reviews.text: For my remortgage as an expat, I could't ask FBS for more. From application through ongoing communication to product switch, it has been smooth sailing with excellent and transparent communication, no hidden surprises and super responsive.

reviews.title: Enquired about options with Aaron, good experience a...
reviews.text: Enquired about options with Aaron, good experience and please with service

reviews.title: Very helpful team - the service and advise was spot...
reviews.text: Very helpful team - the service and advise was spot on

reviews.title: EXCELLENT SERVICE.
reviews.text: I spoke at length with Louise regarding the probability of me moving home and porting my mortgage to the new property. My overall experience was excellent and the information I was provided with was clear and easy to understand. I would like to compliment Louise for her friendly attitude whilst maintaining her level of professionalism.

reviews.title: very friendly Service
reviews.text: I spoke to Simone She was very helpful & Professional. It’s very nice when you get help in difficult time . Thanks

reviews.title: Louise Taylor was exceptionally helpful and professi...
reviews.text: Louise Taylor was exceptionally helpful and professional. She couldn’t do enough to help us. Louise promised to get back to us, and true to her word she returned our enquiry in a very efficient manner.

reviews.title: vandelle was very helpful, professional and knowledg...
reviews.text: vandelle was very helpful, professional and knowledgeable. She answered all questions thoroughly. Excellent job Vandelle. Thank you so much

reviews.title: Exellent customer service
reviews.text: Exellent customer service - I had some pretty dumb questions about my offset mortgage account, but your fantastic customer service representative, Gillian Collard, was patient, highly professional and explained everything perfectly. Absolutely faultless!

reviews.title: The person I dealt with on the phone was really frie...
reviews.text: The person I dealt with on the phone was really friendly and super helpful. Talked me through everything very clearly.

reviews.title: i wanted to pay off a capital sum on my mortgage and...
reviews.text: i wanted to pay off a capital sum on my mortgage and i spoke to Gillian Collard who was very helpful and confirmed everything had been completed as instructed

reviews.title: Helpful staff
reviews.text: Staff very friendly, polite & helpful as had received an unnecessary confusing letter despite having refixed the mortgage deal previously

reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service.
reviews.text: I needed assistance with an enquiry regarding my mortgage account, Catherine C provided this quickly and pleasantly.

reviews.title: Extremely polite and helpful
reviews.text: The young lady I spoke to was extremely polite and helpful and made sure I understood everything completely

reviews.title: I spoke to Ryan Brasier.
reviews.text: I spoke to Ryan Brasier. He was courteous throughout and most helpful. I am most impressed and have complete confidence in the Society.

reviews.title: Excellent service from family building society.
reviews.text: Excellent service from family building society. This is the best building society to get mortgage. Their product is to the people need and very good cooperative and helpful staff.

reviews.text: Helpful and friendly advisers provided useful information. Thank you.

reviews.title: Extremely helpful and pleasant assistance on the phone.

reviews.title: Criteria Check
reviews.text: We're a mortgage brokerage firm who specialise in securing BTL and Resi mortgages for UK expats living/working overseas. I needed some criteria information to add FBS to our sourcing system. Michelle was very helpful.

reviews.title: Their values shine through
reviews.text: In all our dealings with the Family Building Society, their values shine through: fairness, transparency and customer service that goes above and beyond. Taking out a mortgage is a major life event and FBS made it a very good experience.

reviews.title: Outstanding Service from start to Completion
reviews.text: My BDM Amar Mashru was so helpful in helping me present the case. He was quick with responses and very knowledgeable with all aspects of criteria. Somy, well she was just so amazing and went beyond the call of duty with her communications and understanding of the case. I cant praise her enough. Also, a mention to Eric who was quick to overcome my challenges when I called in for help. Outstanding service from all involved and one super happy broker and client. Thank you Team FBS

reviews.title: Excellent rage of savings products.
reviews.text: Excellent rage of savings products. Secure online message service very good. I have opened 3 accounts recently and it was easy to do so Account certificates arrived shortly afterwards. Delighted to have become a member a terrific building society.

reviews.title: Great service as always from Family Building Society
reviews.text: Great service as always from Family Building Society

reviews.title: Excellent service from start to finish
reviews.text: From start to finish have had such good support and assistance. Very clear explanations. Wuick response and I was en ex pat with no luck till FBS and they made the whole process easy. Have now cleared Morthage and they even congratulated me

reviews.title: I called to discuss a case
reviews.text: I called to discuss a case and Aaron was really helpful, provided me with all the information needed

reviews.title: Excellent Service
reviews.text: As a broker it is important to have good support where you are discussing a case which I did when I spoke with Rosie who I discussed the case with and obtained a Decision in Principle and supported me up to when I submitted the application.

reviews.title: This was my first direct contact with the Building S...
reviews.text: This was my first direct contact with the Building Society and everything was positive delivered with excellent customer service

reviews.title: Really Good Experience.
reviews.text: I had a really good experience and was given all the help and information I required to enable me to come to my decision. Serena was very polite, helpful and patient in explaining all the options available to me both on the telephone and online. Well done, thank you.

reviews.title: Customer Service
reviews.text: Call was dealt with quickly and efficiently by Louise, friendly and helpful. 5 stars!

reviews.title: Usually quick to pick up the phone, staff are always...
reviews.text: Usually quick to pick up the phone, staff are always friendly and helpful

reviews.text: when ever I call for any queries I get exceptionally helpful and polite response

reviews.text: So far my broker has been dealing with them but I just called to make payment of the application fee and the lady I spoke to was polite, cheerful and helpful.

reviews.title: Enjoyable review
reviews.text: One each occasion when dealing with the Society the ladies I dealt with on both occasions were very polite helpful informative and concise.

reviews.title: Fast efficient uncomplicated.
reviews.text: Fast efficient uncomplicated and friendly and its easy to talk with a person.

reviews.text: Lisa & Ali provided excellent customer service

reviews.text: Dave Hobbs was very helpful in navigating our enquiry for a mortgage and provided important information that would have been difficult to find elsewhere!

reviews.title: "Keiran" answered all my queries immediately and eff...
reviews.text: "Keiran" answered all my queries immediately and efficiently. Makes me glad I am with The Family Building Society.

reviews.title: Ryan was patient and very helpful and explained ever...
reviews.text: Ryan was patient and very helpful and explained everything we needed to know regarding portal of out mortgage.

reviews.title: Changing mortgage product.
reviews.text: Very clear and straight forward, response times were very good and changing product was remarkably stress free.

reviews.title: Brilliant company.
reviews.text: Brilliant company. Staff always lovely, not always the best rate but always the best service and I wouldn't go anywhere else.

reviews.title: Good service
reviews.text: Very fast in answering calls and the staffs are friendly and knowledgeable.

reviews.title: Ryan helped me today He patiently answered all my qu...
reviews.text: Ryan helped me today He patiently answered all my questions he was great and very helpful

reviews.title: Excellent Briefing Rescues Client
reviews.text: With my mortgage product coming to its end in March, i selected another product in January but then failed to provide written confirmation. On phoning FBS today, I discovered my selection was no longer available. But, the FBS agent I spoke with (Serena) led me by the hand through options available, I made my selection, and the show was back on the road. She was enormously helpful and her briefing crystal clear. Well done and thank you. Major Nick

reviews.title: I have had a fantastic experience with family buildi...
reviews.text: I have had a fantastic experience with family building Society. Their customer service is outstanding—friendly, knowledgeable, and always willing to go the extra mile to assist with any inquiries.

reviews.title: I rang to find out about how to apply for a mortgage.
reviews.text: I rang to find out about how to apply for a mortgage. The security process was politely and quickly gone through, and Kieran from the New Business Team was extremely helpful and informative.

reviews.title: Really nice people to talk with and explained with d...
reviews.text: Really nice people to talk with and explained with detail and clarity

reviews.title: LOUISE DID WELL!
reviews.text: I was more than happy with Louise's recommendations regarding possibilities for a mortgage, considering I am a 69yr old foreigner with permanent right to remain but with foreign pensions with a British wife considerably younger. A complex situation which was handled with professionalism and care.

reviews.title: Switching my mortgage.
reviews.text: I telephoned to arrange my mortgage switch and the agent couldn't have been more helpful. She explained the working of the associated savings account, which I'd never come across before. She also explained that the cashback offer, which I'd seen online, applied to re-mortgaging, rather than switching. I was then informed about what would happen next. Excellent service!

reviews.title: I sometime struggle with the way Family BS underwrit...
reviews.text: I sometime struggle with the way Family BS underwrite a mortgage. However on this occasion my experience was what I would deem to be "normal" and no strange requests for items were made and once docs were received the case progressed nicely

reviews.title: Needed advice about changing or porting my mortgage.
reviews.text: Needed advice about changing or porting my mortgage. The customer service representa (Alice) patiently dealt with all of my 'what if' questions, was very helpful and fhad a lovely approach

reviews.title: Efficient communication about a complex subject.
reviews.text: Efficient communication about a complex subject. Felt very confidant the advisor was competent and well informed.

reviews.title: Very helpful staff and polite.
reviews.text: Very helpful staff and polite. I cannot praise them enough for helping me secure a mortgage.

reviews.title: Louise Taylor was very friendly and professional in...
reviews.text: Louise Taylor was very friendly and professional in her work i would highly recommend you company to others

reviews.title: Breath of Fresh Air
reviews.text: Generally very little waiting time to speak to customer services and all staff knowledgeable on the products. It's a breath of fresh air compared with the average experience.

reviews.title: Don't come much better than that!
reviews.text: No waiting, David was quick, knowledgeable, helpful and resolved my query with maximum courtesy and minimum fuss. Thank you.

reviews.title: very help full people and good service
reviews.text: very help full people and good service

reviews.title: We spoke with Rian Brasier today and he could not ha...
reviews.text: We spoke with Rian Brasier today and he could not have been more helpful. He gave us all the information we needed and was very very polite and understanding.

reviews.title: Informative and friendly.
reviews.text: Informative and friendly. Very happy with the experience.

reviews.title: Ryan the mortgage adviser was brilliant and gave me...
reviews.text: Ryan the mortgage adviser was brilliant and gave me all the info I needed to make my decision which deal to take. Ryan is a credit to the company

reviews.title: Making a call to the society
reviews.text: Only had two telephone calls to make but the service was prompt and the advice clear and helpful.

reviews.title: Over 60's mortgage
reviews.text: Currently lookin for an over 60's mortgage for a building renovation project. Louise has been exceptionally helpful throughout and it looks as though Family Building Society will be able to offer the product I am after.

reviews.title: Great customer service - poor website
reviews.text: Guy was extremely helpful and patient explaining capital and overpayments - but the process of leaving a review is overly complicated - especially if you are trying to use a phone.

reviews.title: Aaron Nichols was extremely helpful in liaising with...
reviews.text: Aaron Nichols was extremely helpful in liaising with the underwriter to get the case agreed and then progressed to offer so was delighted with the outcome.
